data.title: Drake unleashes visuals to brand new track titled 'Laugh Now, Cry Later' ft Lil Durk, announcing his upcoming album 'Certified Lover Boy'.
data.meta_description: With the upcoming release of Drake's new album, he has dropped a track titled 'Laugh Now Cry Later', featuring Lil Durk. This gives us an insight to what the album may involve and is due to be highly successful.
data.text:
Potentially the greatest artist in the world right now, Drake surprises us with clean visuals to brand new track 'Laugh Now Cry Later' featuring Lil Durk. Throughout his career, he has given us albums, mixtapes and singles consistently for the last decade and still is! In 2020 alone, Drake has achieved multiple top 10 singles in the US billboard charts, breaking records in history. This includes tracks like 'Toosie Slide' and the recent Dj Khaled collaborations 'Greece' and 'Popstar', gaining approval from listeners around the world. His consistency is undoubtably his stand out feature and what makes him the great artist he is today.

With Drake's previous album - Scorpion, being released 2 whole years ago, the announcement of his upcoming album 'Certified Lover Boy' has sparked huge excitement to audiences around the world. With the release of 'Laugh Now Cry Later' ft Lil Durk, it has given us an idea of what Drake's new album may involve. The visuals were immensely compelling taken place at - NIKE HQ, featuring Vision Mercedes-Maybach 6 concept cars.

The significance of Lil Durks feature is huge. Already being a highly approved artist, with a collaboration with an artist like Drake allows him to finally receive the recognition he deserves. This track is undoubtably due to be successful and will please many audiences.

CHECK OUT THE VISUALS BELOW!
